content: @Amelia Livingston Congratulations with this PR! It's fantastic that you've done all this stuff!
And it looks well-documented and very well written.
Thank you!! Sorry about the wait. The next few PRs will be back to back since I've got the time now.

I have one question: At some point Neil Strickland designed a "characteristic predicate" for ring localizations that turned out to be really useful in the schemes project. (@Kevin Buzzard can certainly say more about this.) Is there something like that for localizations of monoids? If so, should it be part of this PR?
It's in the second half of this file, so the next PR! I could add it to this PR if people don't mind it being long though, I just need to finish tidying it up.
